path: artifacts/Roronoa Zoro Inu Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.ZoroInu: contracts/Roronoa Zoro Inu Full Smart Contract Security Audit/ZoroInu

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function `includeInReward()` uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the `_excluded` list, which may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
